item.title: Amnesia True Subway Horror
item.description: If you love mysticism and are not afraid of various oddities, then you will definitely like this game. After launching it, you will find yourself in a mysterious house, which is simply filled with riddles. Carefully explore its rooms to understand how you need to act in order to uncover all its secrets. Thrills are guaranteed.
